about.title: Architecting Peace in Chaos.
about.intro: Establishing order in an entropy-increasing digital universe.
about.description: I lived through the most rapid 'Golden Age' of the internet. In those days of exponential business expansion and constant server meltdowns, I grew accustomed to working in the eye of the storm‚Äînot only replacing engines on a high-speed rocket but ensuring it flew more steadily than ever.
